name: Roller Nation
content_summary:
# The home of Roller Disco

London’s roller skating party venue helping you enjoy something a little bit different.

[Book your Tickets](https://rollernation.com/events)

or discover our [club nights](https://rollernation.com/club-nights) and [family sessions](https://rollernation.com/family-skate)

### Roller Nation presents “BATTLE JAM”

Roller Nation presents “ [BATTLE JAM](https://rollernation.com/battle-jam-2023-skating-competition)” , what we believe to be  the first dedicated jam skating competition in the UK.

With a top prize of £1500 this will surely be the event to see some of the best jam skating that the UK has to offer!

Our set of judges will be deciding the winner of each round!

[Find Out More Now](https://rollernation.com/battle-jam-2023-skating-competition)
